name: tricycle
body:
![tricycle logo]
(http://staff.washington.edu/lurie/tricycle.gif)

## What is tricycle?
We are looking for *Kepler* [eclipsing binaries](http://keplerebs.villanova.edu) with starspot signals from both stars. That's three periods: one from the eclipses (telling us about masses and radii), and two from the starspot signals (telling us about rotation periods and magnetic activity). As a population, such systems would provide benchmarks for things like stellar evolution models and gyrochronology.

## Project Team

* [Michael Puig](https://github.com/mpuighol)
* [Kolby Weisenburger](https://github.com/kolbylyn)
